parameter.name: ambari.server.url
parameter.description: Enter the Ambari Server REST API cluster resource.
parameter.label: Ambari Cluster URL

parameter.name: ambari.server.username
parameter.description: Enter the Cluster Operator username (for example: admin).
parameter.label: Operator Username

parameter.name: ambari.server.password
parameter.description: Enter the Cluster Operator password (for example: password).
parameter.label: Operator Password

parameter.name: view.kerberos.principal
parameter.description: Kerberos principal associated with this view. For example: ambari/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM. Administrators should make sure that HDFS service has the 'hadoop.proxyuser.[user].groups' and 'hadoop.proxyuser.[user].hosts' configs populated in 'core-site.xml'.

parameter.name: view.kerberos.principal.keytab
parameter.description: Path to the Kerberos principal keytab used for view's user. For example: /etc/security/keytabs/ambari.headless.keytab Administrators should make sure that HDFS service has the 'hadoop.proxyuser.[user].groups' and 'hadoop.proxyuser.[user].hosts' configs populated in 'core-site.xml'.
